oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: CMA awards radio spots - various artists
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recordings of CMA awards radio spots featuring Tennessee Ernie Ford, Loretta Lynn, Marty Robbins, Jerry Reed, Danny Davis, Tompall Glaser, Tommy Overstreet, and Glen Campbell.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) CMA awards radio spot (Tennessee Ernie Ford) -- (00:31) CMA awards radio spot (Loretta Lynn) -- (01:02) CMA awards radio spot (Marty Robbins) -- (01:35) CMA awards radio spot (Jerry Reed) -- (02:08) CMA awards radio spot (Danny Davis) -- (02:41) CMA awards radio spot (Tompall Glaser) -- (03:18) CMA awards radio spot (Tommy Overstreet) -- (03:49) CMA awards radio spot (Glen Campbell)
